productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_uid) AS new_customers_m11 FROM customer WHERE date_acct_opened IS NOT NULL AND date_acct_opened >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1) AND date_acct_opened <  DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-10,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-10,GETDATE())), 1);
calculationType: Customer metrics for the appropriate calendar month.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS prospects FROM customer AS c WHERE CAST(c.date_acct_opened AS date) >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-9,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1) AND CAST(c.date_acct_opened AS date) < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,8,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,8,GETDATE())), 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM oe_hdr AS h WHERE h.customer_id = c.customer_id);
calculationType: Count of prospects (customers without orders) opened in the specified month.
